free-sp-value.name: SP Value
free-sp-value.description: Determines how much SP the Give SP hotkey will grant.

show-finisher-indicator.name: Show Finisher Indicator
show-finisher-indicator.description: Toggles displaying a timing indicator for Full Combo Cancels.

show-finisher-time.name: Measure Indicator in Time
show-finisher-time.description: Determines whether the finisher indicator will measure in frames or time passed.

show-bomb-timer.name: Show Bomb Timer
show-bomb-timer.description: Toggles displaying a timing indicator for Bombs.

allow-save-anywhere.name: Save Anywhere
allow-save-anywhere.description: Overrides the Save Game button to always be enabled.

game-speed-value.name: Game Speed Value
game-speed-value.description: Changes the Game Speed to match this value.

health-player-value.name: Player Health Value
health-player-value.description: Changes the value of the player's health.

health-enemy-value.name: Boss Health Value
health-enemy-value.description: Changes the value of a boss's health.

health-enemy-relative-min-value.name: Boss Minimum Health
health-enemy-relative-min-value.description: Determines the relative minimum for a boss's health during calculations.

health-enemy-relative-max-value.name: Boss Maximum Health
health-enemy-relative-max-value.description: Changes the relative maximum for a boss's health during calculations.

show-variable-display.name: Show Variable Display
show-variable-display.description: Show real-time expression values, you can edit these in Utilities/variableDisplay.js
